column1: Evidence of competent performance in these three Core Units  must be evidenced through completing of the Skills Based Units listed in Groups  B and C

column4: Complying with statutory regulations and organisational safety requirements

column1: Candidates must complete three units from the following

column4: Fault location and diagnosing faults on Pitch Systems and Components
Fault location and diagnosing faults on Yaw Systems and Components
Fault location and diagnosing faults on Convertor Systems and Components
Fault location and diagnosing faults on Control Systems and Components
Fault location and diagnosing faults on Low Voltage Systems and components

column1: Candidates must take three from the following

column4: Diploma in Electrical Power Engineering - Wind Turbine Operations and Maintenance at SCQF level 6
